pkgmetadata.longdescription: Utilities for 'big.matrix' Objects from Package 'bigmemory' // Extend the 'bigmemory' package with various analytics. Functions 'bigkmeans' and 'binit' may also be used with native R objects. For 'tapply'-like functions, the bigtabulate package may also be helpful. For linear algebra support, see 'bigalgebra'. For mutex (locking) support for advanced shared- memory usage, see 'synchronicity'.
